discover.isEnabled.title: Activates discover
discover.isEnabled.description: if true = discover tab is enable for users

contacts.isEnabled.title: Enable contacts
contacts.isEnabled.description: if true = contacts will be available for users

isHidingContentInTaskManagerEnabled.title: Hide app content in task manager
isHidingContentInTaskManagerEnabled.description: if true = app content will be hidden in task manager, disabled screenshot, video record program cant catch UI

passCode.isEnabled.title: User can or cann`t setup pass code in his profile

passcode.failedAttemptsTillBlocking.title: Wrong unlocks count before disabling pass code input

passcode.failedAttemptsTimeoutMillis.title: Default incremental timeout after each wrong pass code unlock

isMultifactorauthActive.title: Activates Multifactorauth
isMultifactorauthActive.description: if true = Multifactorauth is enable for users (factors are tuned on server's config file)

userProfile.nameMinLength.title: Minimum length of user's profile name

userProfile.nameMaxLength.title: Maximum length of user's profile name

userProfile.nicknameMinLength.title: Minimum length of user's profile nickname

userProfile.nicknameMaxLength.title: Maximum length of user's profile nickname

userProfile.nicknameAllowedChars.title: List of allowed chars in nickname

userProfile.aboutMinLength.title: Minimum length of user's profile about

userProfile.aboutMaxLength.title: Maximum length of user's profile about

userProfile.avatarFileMaxSize.title: Maximum size of user's profile avatar

userProfile.isEnabledEditProfile.title: User can edit his profile or not

userProfile.isFullNameEditable.title: User can edit his full name or not

userProfile.isNickNameEditable.title: User can edit his nick name or not

userProfile.isGlobalSettingsNotification.title: User can edit global settings notification his profile or not

userProfile.isSecuritySettingsEnabled.title: User can or cann`t work with security settings in his profile

groups.isProfileEditEnabled.title: User can edit group profile or not

groups.permissions.canLeaveEnabled.title: false - user can leave from any Group/Channel even official, true - user can leave only if has LEAVE permission

spaces.isEnabled.title: Activates Spaces
spaces.isEnabled.description: true - for product app, false - in platform

chat.mentionsInput.isEnabled.title: Show or hide mentions in chat input bar
chat.mentionsInput.isEnabled.description: if true = mentions in chat are enable for users

chat.bubbles.title: Activates bubbles in chat
chat.bubbles.description: if true = bubbles in chat are enable for users

chat.documentPhotoEnabled.title: Activates document photo extension support
chat.documentPhotoEnabled.description: Show photo content instead of the document if possible

chat.stickersEnabled.title: Activates stickers in chat
chat.stickersEnabled.description: Show or hide sending stickers feature

chat.sharedMedia.isEnabled.title: Activates shared media scene for chat

chat.bubbleGroupingTimeGap.title: Time gap in milliseconds to break bubble message group

badges.menu.dialogs.title: Activates budges in chat
badges.menu.dialogs.description: if true = budges in chat are enable for users

messaging.swipeToReply.title: Activates swipe to reply on message

isSwipeBackEnabled.title: Activates swipe(left to right) between fragments which means back button click
isSwipeBackEnabled.description: if true = swipe is enable for users

isCertAuthActive.title: Activates selecting a certificate for authorization
isCertAuthActive.description: if true = button for selecting a certificate is available on the authorization screen

isAutoDetectEndpointEnabled.title: Enable auto detect endpoint at authentification process
isAutoDetectEndpointEnabled.description: if true = auto detect endpoint enabled

fileUploading.perfectRatio.title: The ratio of file download time (in ms) to size (in bytes)
fileUploading.perfectRatio.description: Required for dynamically resizing following chunks when loading. This ratio is compared with the ratio of the previous batch of chunks, therefore it is concluded whether it is necessary to increase or decrease the size of following chunks

fileUploading.maximumChunkSize.title: Maximum size of Chunk (in bytes) for sending to server

fileUploading.maxFileSizeBytes.title: Maximum file size (in bytes) for sending to server

fileUploading.minimumChunkSize.title: Minimum size of Chunk (in bytes) for sending to server

upload.uploadEnabled.title: Determines whether the user can upload the file

search.profileSearchEnabled.title: Determines whether the user can perform profile search

search.localSearchCount.title: Determines amount of local search results

search.localSearchUsersFirst.title: Defines the order for local search results. (If true -  users first)

search.globalSearchUsersFirst.title: Defines the order for global search results. (If true -  users first)

search.users.secondaryInfo.customProfile.title: Defines key for user data custom profile.
search.users.secondaryInfo.customProfile.description: if installed, value from custom profile with the key will be displayed in search user cell

notifications.android.isEnable.title: Toggle switch to enable / disable the display of push notifications

notifications.web.newMessageAudioUrl.title: URL to an audio file for a new message notification

notifications.web.newMessageIconUrl.title: URL to icon image for a new message notification

notifications.web.newMessageVibrationPat.title: Vibration pattern a new message notification
notifications.web.newMessageVibrationPat.description: Overrides a default app's vibration pattern. Values are serialized as an array of strings in JSON format

calls.isEnabled.title: Enable calls
calls.isEnabled.description: if true = calls are enable for users

calls.isAudioCallsEnabled.title: Enable audio calls
calls.isAudioCallsEnabled.description: if true = audio calls are enable for users

calls.isVideoCallsEnabled.title: Enable video calls
calls.isVideoCallsEnabled.description: if true = video calls are enable for users

calls.isExternalCallsEnabled.title: Enable external phone calls
calls.isExternalCallsEnabled.description: if true = external phone calls are enable for users

calls.history.isFeatureEnabled.title: Enable calls history feature
calls.history.isFeatureEnabled.description: if true = the call history feature is enabled for users, otherwise it is hidden at all

calls.history.isAvailable.title: Enable calls history screen
calls.history.isAvailable.description: if true = the call history screen is enabled for users, otherwise the placeholder will be shown

targeting.schema.title: Schema of targeting form
targeting.schema.description: JSON with description of UI schema for targeting form

chat.media.interactiveElements.maxWidget.title: Maximum count of interactive widgets in one group

chat.media.interactiveElements.maxGroupC.title: Maximum count of interactive media groups in one message

chat.media.interactiveElements.maxWidget.title: Maximum count of characters in one interactive widget

chat.media.interactiveElements.maxGroupT.title: Maximum count of characters in title of interactive media group

chat.media.interactiveElements.maxGroupD.title: Maximum count of characters in description of interactive media group
